name: Nikunj Makwana
about: I am a developer based in Gujarat, India, currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science. My passion lies in honing my coding skills and creating websites. I specialize in developing WebApps and websites, constructing APIs. I am dedicated to self-improvement, persistently working independently to enhance and refine my skills.

project.name: Run_it
description: Developed a web-based code execution platform using React, Tailwind CSS, and Monaco Editor for real-time code execution and diagnostics.
Implemented responsive design with draggable and resizable panels to enhance user experience across devices.

project.name: Cloth_Store
description: Developed a responsive e-commerce web application using React, Tailwind CSS, Vite, Express, and TypeScript to ensure seamless cross-device functionality.
Integrated backend APIs for real-time product management, improving navigation and enhancing user interactions.

project.name: Make_an_Order
description: Effortless Ordering: Utilize React.js for frontend, Express.js for backend, and Tailwind CSS for smooth navigation and ordering.
Immersive 3D: Enhance product visualization with Three.js for an engaging shopping experience.

project.name: Chat_Application
description: Real-Time Communication: Utilized Socket.io for seamless real-time messaging, enabling instant message delivery and chat room management.
Responsive and Scalable UI: Developed with React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS, ensuring a mobile-first, user-friendly, and scalable interface.
